Name: Quintessential Drop
Ingredients: 30 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of dehydrated lime wheel & Luxardo Maraschino Cherry .
Review: This Scotch-based riff on the classic Negroni is dry and bitter and benefits from the extra dilution afforded by an additional stir while drinking - Gary "gaz" Regan style.
History: Created in 2017 by Luca Missaglia at Aqua Shard , London, England.
Nutrition: One serving of Quintessential Drop contains 188 calories
